Description.Text: The Sandman Hotel Oakville is conveniently located on the Oakville/Burlington border between Niagara Falls and Toronto, and within convenient access to restaurants, large parks, sporting venues, Toronto Pearson International Airport and Toronto city centre. Each of the 166 beautifully appointed guest rooms feature excellent amenities, clean and comfortable accommodations, and complimentary high speed Internet. The hotel offers complimentary parking, banquet and meeting facilities, Chop Steakhouse & Bar, and Denny`s Restaurant, rest assured you have made a smart choice. Other amenities in each guest room is free Wi-Fi, Alarm Clock Radio, Microwave and Fridge and Complimentary Coffee and Tea.
